185811494.review: its fun, played it before 10 years.

185735661.review: Good detective game. Where you take a role of murdered detective. This game is a whole new prespective on detective genre. I really liked this game. Characters are written good, graphics are still upholding for a 10 year old game. What saddens me is the bugs. Thru my playtrough i stumbled upon many bugs wich arent to my liking. but still. If you like Adventure/Detectice genre this game is just for you 8/10 if you dont like these types of games i would say 6/10. 6/10 Doesnt mean its a bad game. If you see it in sale for 2 euros just buy it. :))

185708959.review:
Murdered: Soul Suspect es un juego de 2014 que, la verdad, ha envejecido bastante bien. Aunque se pueden notar algunos detalles en la IA o en los NPCs que evidencian su antigüedad, su apartado artístico sigue siendo muy sólido. Gráficamente se ve fluido, y las mecánicas, aunque simples, funcionan correctamente. Es un título ideal para poner a jugar a un sobrino o primo durante un fin de semana.

En cuanto a la historia, está muy bien lograda: tomamos el papel de un detective que debe resolver su propia muerte mientras persigue a un asesino serial. La narrativa es lo suficientemente interesante como para imaginarla convertida en una miniserie de plataformas como Amazon Prime o HBO Max. Tiene un aire a lo Sherlock Holmes, con personajes algo ásperos y un toque sobrenatural que le da su propia identidad. Además, todo gira en torno al pueblo de Salem, lo que refuerza la atmósfera fantasmagórica del juego.

El final es inesperado y bien ejecutado, con puzzles entretenidos y curiosos que enriquecen la experiencia. ¿Recomendaría el juego? Sin duda. Tiene una duración aproximada de 8 a 10 horas y ofrece una historia que engancha de principio a fin.

Nota importante: Si estás interesado en conseguir el platino, ¡revisa bien todo el museo! Una vez que salgas, no podrás volver a entrar.

8/10

185699610.review: Очень интересная игра в необычном сетинге. Смесь heavy rain с мистикой. Сюжет держит до самого конца. Локации очень красочные. И за 13 часов прохождения не успевает наскучить. Советую всем.

185573242.review: 港真我是真的喜欢这个创意，但是无云存档+无官中+无地图+潜行杀demon操作难度爆表，真是压弯了中年gamer的脊梁。

185550899.review:
La debilidades de este juego es que por momentos es excesivamente fácil en la deducción, no implementó suficientes novedades en su gameplay y la mecánica de sigilo es algo torpe. Sin embargo me ha gustado mucho como abraza su propuesta y las mecánicas jugables están atadas a ser un fantasma, por lo que podemos hacer cosas como atravesar paredes o teletransportarnos. Lo que termina de solidificar el juego es que la historia es buena, el personaje principal pasa por un arco de personaje triste y satisfactorio. Es un tipo de triple AAA que me gustaría ver más seguido, más experimental, más interesante.
7/10

185520415.review:
To this day, this game has one of the best character intro montages i can think of and i make references to it all the time!
While the game is very linear and the story rather short, its quite the experience that is worth the purchase.

185505828.review: 这工作啊，做鬼也不放过了说是

185503767.review:
Murdered: Soul Suspect is a supernatural mystery game where you play as Ronan O’Connor, a ghostly detective solving his own murder in a haunting version of Salem. The story is compelling, with an eerie atmosphere and unique ghostly mechanics like walking through walls and influencing minds.

However, the gameplay is simplistic and repetitive, with easy puzzles and underwhelming stealth segments. While the visuals feel dated, the sound design and voice acting shine, adding depth to the experience.

If you enjoy narrative-driven, atmospheric games, it’s worth a play—just don’t expect a long or challenging adventure.

Pros:
-Unique premise and setting.
-Engaging main storyline with supernatural intrigue.
-Atmospheric sound design and visuals.
-Ghostly mechanics are fun, albeit underutilised.

Cons:
-Gameplay can feel repetitive and overly simplistic.
-Limited exploration and lack of meaningful side content.
-Visuals and animations feel dated.
-Short playtime (around 6-8 hours).

Score: 7/10

185025531.review: Murdered:Soul Suspect представляет собой экшен от третьего лица,где вы выступаете в роли копа-призрака.Собственно мы играем за копа,которых погиб в ходе событий из начала игры.По ходу истории,нам предстоит выяснить,кто же нас отправил на тот свет,скажем так..ну не совсем - наш главный герой Ронан застрял между мирами(миром живых и миром мёртвых).События в игре разворачиваются в городе Салем,где происходят убийства молодых девушек,собственно наш герой занимался расследованиями этих убийств,незадолго до своей кончины.Так же,по ходу сюжета,мы сможем помогать таким же застрявшим между мирами,расследуя их кончину сбором улик и помогая им обрести заслуженный покой.В принципе,геймплей на этом и строится - мы расследуем место событий,поисками улик,так как мы играем за призрака,у нас нет оружия,зато есть способность вселяться в людей.Противниками тут выступают демоны,сделаны они довольно жутко,особенно когда начинают кричать.По сюжету скажу,что он довольно интересный,атмосфера в игре проделана на отличном уровне,довольно необычный геймплей.Игру я могу порекомендовать,на пару-тройку вечеров она вас затянет,только советую проходить её осенью,это добавит вам вайба к игре.Игры увы нет в российском регионе Steam,брать рекомендую на сезонных распродажах,игра полностью на русском языке.

185018858.review: 7/10, хороший детективчик на разок, для своего времени неплохая адвенчура, определенно стоит пройти если нравятся игры такого рода

184931656.review: good game with good story and gameplay . i love it

184880985.review:
La trama es excelente y casi todos los argumentos de la historia ficticia tienen correspondencia verídica en la historia real de Salem y sus implicaciones con los espíritus. Sin duda los desarrolladores acudieron a fuentes como historiadores y espiritistas. En este ultimo punto está obviamente inspirado en Beyond Two Souls pero en comparación no es tan alocado y la estética es mucho más sombría. 
La trama es completamente lineal. Si bien hay objetivos secundarios que brindan contexto a los lugares no son de importancia ni añaden vida como las misiones secundarias de witcher, skyrim o assasins creed. Sobre todo porque las historias son macabras así que es mejor no enterarse. Sin embargo son interesantes ver todas las posibilidades que abarca esta obra de ficción, tal y como sucede en Detroit Become Human.

184793768.review:

The story is not very long, but it is very good.

Ein Spiel mit einer hervorragenden Story und einer guten Kulisse in Salem mit seiner Geschichte der Hexenverfolgung. 

Das einzige Manko an dem Spiel ist die Gameplaymechanik mit den Dämonen, da es kein Kampfsystem gibt und man mehr oder weniger genau den Punkt abpassen muss um den Dämon zu greifen. Das war eher ein Lückenfüller um das Spiel unnütze in die Länge zu ziehen.

Im großen und ganzen ein ruhiges kurzweiliges Spiel mit viel Dialog und einer mitreißenden Story.

184520583.review:
Overall I'd recommend this for fans of the genre and steam deck users! Or if you want a game with a decent story that you can kill about 8 hours with for a cheap price. However if you are just interested in the story then perhaps just watching a play-through online would suffice as there isn't really much challenging or rewarding game-play involved in this one. 
6.66/10

Pros:
- Decent story which can be beaten in under 8 hours. 
- Runs great on Steam deck at 90 FPS on max settings. Just be sure to turn off V-sync. 
- You can possess cats.
- Perfect for fans of the detective / occult mystery genre.
- Goes on sale for really cheap.
- Decent atmosphere and world-building, in addition to solid voice acting for a 10 year old game!

Neutral:
- Game-play is not very challenging and focuses more on the atmosphere/story.
- Collectibles are not too tough to obtain.. but may require a bit of running around in circles or backtracking if you don't want to use a guide if you're seeking 100% completion.

Cons:
- Controls can be a bit clunky (especially the object interaction prompts, which can sometimes require you to position your character a certain way before the interaction pop-up appears).
- Demon enemies feel like they were just added in to extend the playtime of the game; they're more of a chore rather than interesting or fun.
- No side-quests, just lots of collectibles.

184502115.review: If you like solving mysteries, you may like this game. The problem are the in between mechanics: Combat demons, move to other stages that feels repetitive and a LOT of collectibles, like over 170. If you find fun in getting all the collectibles, this is ideal for you.

184420146.review:
Leider soviele Bugs , das man Bug Fixes bei Yt sucht , diese tatsächlich findet :D Um dann direkt in den nächsten Bug zu laufen :D

Schade , sonst wäre das game geil !

184335328.review:
The Good - 
+ Good story and Interesting characters
+ Nice atmosphere and music
+ Visually holds up even 10 years later
+ Game feels and plays like a true detective game,like how real life detectives would solve cases.Finding clues and then letting the player figure things out on their own and solve the case.Felt good when i solved them all.
+ The lore in game is expanded via collectable which also act like codex entries which also flesh out the game further.The drawback is that there are more than 200+ collectables in the game.So up to the player whether they want to get them or not.Usually i view this much collectable as a negative but here it adds to the game with lore entries so i gave it a pass here.
+ The game can be 100% completed in a single run play through.

The Bad - 

- The character model of MC hits an invisible wall of sorts as well as freeze for a second or two when you quickly change his movements/actions as well as feel a bit sluggish.
- Game breaking priest bug in the Church level which literally ruined my experience and stopped me from making further progress in the game.this should have been fixed ages ago by the developers.But nope,this still exists.Had to look at a steam guide for a fix.Also after applying said fix,the main area in the Church level near the level exit,is blurred as if the game hadn't loaded the textures properly.Also fix for this mentioned in steam guide.
- The demons combat section where you hide from them and stealth kill them was unnecessary in my opinion.They should have done it away altogether.
- Some collectables are not saved by the game automatically and must be reacquired if restarting from checkpoint.

Despite its flaws,its a good 7/10 game for me.Not all games have to be 8/10 or 9/10.

184278587.review: Хорошая детективная история с неплохими твистами. Приятно провела время в игре, разгадывая загадки вместе с харизматичным детективом. Но местами напрягали quick time events и бесили демоны, которые скорее создавали массовку, чем вписывались в игровой процесс. За возможность побегать кошечкой отдельный респект авторам)

184270279.review:
I generally don't like the term "hidden gem" because I feel it usually gets incorrectly applied to games that the majority of people have actually heard of and celebrate. In this case, however, I think it fits the bill. Nobody talked about this game when it released and nobody talks about it now, but it's a phenomenal supernatural murder mystery that deserves to be played by anyone intrigued by the genre. 

The gameplay reminds me of a mix of Life is Strange and the Sherlock games. You're not so much solving mysteries yourself through deduction, but rather using your powers to reveal clues that the game then stitches together for you as it reveals more of the narrative. A narrative which, to be honest, surprised me with its quality. The story, characters, and voicework was head-and-shoulders above what I was expecting. In the 8-10ish hours I played the game I never lost interest, and I was always eager to see what came next. There's so many games to play these days that I find it difficult sometimes to commit to just one, but this one hooked me from the get-go. 

This game regularly goes on sale for like 2 bucks, and it is genuinely one of the best uses of your money that I can think of at that pricepoint. Fans of mystery, history, and the supernatural all owe it to themselves to play this.

184169002.review:
A great story with an intriguing premise, held back by mediocre gameplay. 

Finished the game eight years ago and recently replayed it. Almost a decade later, my impression is far more favorable. The idea of playing as a ghost cop, who can't interact with the living and instead relies on his newly aquired spiritual powers, puts a fun twist on the detective genre. Placing the murder mystery in Salem creates a spooky vibe and allows for decent world building. The gameplay itself however is extremely simple, buggy and frankly holds the game back. 

If you enjoy a good crime story with a supernatural twist, you might be pleasantly surprised. If you're all about gameplay, you should skip this one. Either way, buy it on sale.

I for one, am gonna remember it as a guilty pleasure of mine and would love to see a better execution of the premise, as there's some true potential.

184164380.review: Juegazo de la primera etapa de ps4 y las ultimas de ps3... Las cinemáticas son buenas y el descubrir la historia también. El gameplay es simple a dia de hoy pero no malo, recomiendo buscar en Internet como cambiar las voces de español, a ingles para ganar ese toque que se pierde en el doblaje, por que si este titulo no tiene opción de cambiar el idioma de las voces

184018155.review:
So when the Xbox 360 marketplace was shutting down, I happened to grab this game for dirt cheap, probably around the same price as on sale right now during the Winter sale. I avoided this game for a while because most people said it wasn't very good. I played it recently and beat it. Over there it ran pretty decent considering the hardware it had going with minor stutters. I enjoyed it so much that I got it again on Steam and replayed it with uncapped framerates and higher resolution. It's a fun detective type game with collectibles around the game that expand the lore. Not every game has to be 100 hours or online only to be good. 

Well worth sale price. It's too bad the devs are no longer around as the studio closed shortly after release. I enjoyed their other game Dark Void as well.

Sidenote: I think this is the first game you get to play as a cat in certain parts of the game, a prototype for Stray methinks. It's too bad they didn't jump on it sooner.

People have mixed opinions on this one.
I finished it, didn't have any bugs.
The game is pretty easy too but I don't mind and neither should you. ( Got if for a price of a cup of coffe).
It is a ghost story with a dark setting.
The game has a reputation among gamers so I decided to investigate.
I'm glad I did.
The game won't make anyone cream their pants or anything; but it's still a good experience.

183773923.review:
First of all, I want to say that if you came for fighting games and big action, then this is not for you.
This game is for easy relaxation, where you don't need to jump and kill everyone.
Very interesting horror, for a vibe passage. Horror-detective with an interesting scenario (I have great hope that the developers of this game will create a series or a film based on this universe).

183739978.review:
This is a very unique game.

It's a slow burn, but that doesn't necessarily take away from the gaming experience itself.

There are several unique features that make the game interesting, while the story and the overall mood itself make for a quite immersive experience.

The only thing I wished was a bit more polished, are the interactions, as they only can be activated if one is very precise and approaches the interactibles slowly, and by a specific angle sometimes, making them easy to be overlooked and missed.

So, if you are looking for something different, yet story rich and chill - this is the game for you!

Cheers!
